trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations of Web services discovery documents for use in populating another Web services discovery document.

The DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern"></xref> class.
Returns the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"></xref> object for a given discovery document.
The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.

A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> instance contains the location of the .vsdisco file, which is also the file system directory corresponding to the HTTP request passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method.
The file system path of the discovery document.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference"></xref> object that specifies the location of a .vsdisco file.
Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.
The pattern "*.vsdisco" indicates a .vsdisco Web services discovery document extension.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern> class, on the other hand, indicates a .disco extension.
